mapper.select:
SELECT log_id,auth_name,plat_code, trade_code, trade_name, begin_time, end_time,ret_code,exec_time,protocol FROM sys_trade_log t where 1=1
AND t.begin_time >= CONCAT(#{begin_time},' 00:00:00')
AND t.begin_time < DATE_ADD(CONCAT(#{end_time},' 00:00:00'), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND t.auth_name like '%'||#{auth_name}||'%' '%'+#{auth_name}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{auth_name}, '%')
AND t.trade_code = #{trade_code}
order by begin_time desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_trade_log (log_id,auth_name,plat_code,trade_code,trade_name,begin_time,end_time, ret_code,exec_time, protocol) VALUES (#{log_id}, #{auth_name},#{plat_code},#{trade_code},#{trade_name}, #{begin_time},#{end_time},#{ret_code},#{exec_time}, #{protocol})
